mapper.select: SELECT a.product_code, c.product_name, b.member_id, b.member_code, a.cart_cnt, a.cart_price FROM cart_tbl a JOIN member_tbl b ON (a.member_code = b.member_code) JOIN product_tbl c ON (a.product_code = c.product_code) WHERE b.member_id = #{loggedInUsername}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart_tbl WHERE product_code = #{ productCode }
mapper.select: SELECT b.member_code, SUM(a.cart_cnt) AS total_cart_cnt, SUM(a.cart_price) AS total_cart_price FROM cart_tbl a JOIN member_tbl b ON (a.member_code = b.member_code) JOIN product_tbl c ON (a.product_code = c.product_code) WHERE b.member_code = #{memberCode} GROUP BY b.member_code
